amendment.description: At the end of title III, add the following new section: SEC. 306. REPORT ON CONSEQUENCES OF MILITARY STRIKE AGAINST IRAN. Not later than 60 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Director of National Intelligence shall submit to the congressional intelligence committees a report containing an assessment of the consequences of a military strike against Iran.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-504 to require the Director of National Intelligence to submit to the congressional intelligence committees a report containing an assessment of the consequences of a military strike against Iran within 60 days.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Conyers.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
